Spider Queen.name: Spider Queen
Spider Queen.blurb: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
Spider Queen.description: Innate - Human Form: When Elise's abilities hits a target she gains one dormant Spiderling, up to 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on  Human Form's Rank).
Spider Queen.description2: Innate - Spider Form: Elise's basic attacks deal 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 (based on  Spider Form's Rank) (+ 30% AP)  bonus magic damage and  heal her for  4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on  Spider Form's Rank) (+ 10% AP) health on-hit.
Spider Queen.notes:
* Elise will always begin the game and respawn with maximum available Spiderlings stored.
 Elise's  Human Form ability casts can only store one Spiderling each.
 Spider Form's basic attacks will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal (the bonus damage does not).
 Spider Form's bonus damage and healing does not occur when attacking structures.
 PENDING FOR TEST: Spider Form's relationship with  dodge,  block, and  blind.

 Elise in spider form deals  proc damage on her basic attacks.
 The Spiderlings apply  pet damage.

Neurotoxin.name: Neurotoxin
Neurotoxin.blurb: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
Neurotoxin.description: Active: Elise fires toxin at the target enemy unit, dealing magic damage, capped against  monsters.
Neurotoxin.leveling:
Magic Damage:
40 / 75 / 110 / 145 / 180 (+ 4% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's current health)
Max. Monster Damage:
115 / 175 / 235 / 295 / 355

Venomous Bite.name: Venomous Bite
Venomous Bite.blurb: Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
Venomous Bite.description: Active: Elise  dashes to the target enemy and bites them, dealing magic damage, capped against monsters.
Venomous Bite.leveling:
Magic Damage:
70 / 110 / 150 / 190 / 230 (+ 8% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of target's missing health)
Max. Monster Damage:
145 / 210 / 275 / 340 / 405
Venomous Bite.description2: If there are active  spiderlings or a  votatile spiderling nearby, they will  dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.
Venomous Bite.notes:
* Venomous Bite cannot be used to cross walls or impassable terrain.
 The target will be damaged regardless.
  Spiderlings can cross walls and terrain to reach Venomous Bite's target and will attack provided Elise stays within their leash range.

Volatile Spiderling.name: Volatile Spiderling
Volatile Spiderling.blurb: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.
Volatile Spiderling.description: Active: Elise summons an  untargetable venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which moves in the target direction.
Volatile Spiderling.description2: The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy unit or at the end of its lifespan, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
Volatile Spiderling.description3: If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing  champions. The spider gains  bonus movement speed, based on its proximity to its target.
Volatile Spiderling.notes: * If Volatile Spiderling dashes to a target due to  Venomous Bite, it will not expire before finishing its jump.

Skittering Frenzy.name: Skittering Frenzy
Skittering Frenzy.blurb: Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
Skittering Frenzy.description: Passive: Elise's  Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed.
Skittering Frenzy.description2: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
Skittering Frenzy.description3: Skittering Frenzy resets Elise's autoattack timer.
Skittering Frenzy.notes:
* Skittering Frenzy has no cast time and does not interrupt Elise's previous orders.
 Elise loses the attack speed bonus immediately when turning back to  Human Form.
 But if she is able to transform back in less than 3 seconds (only via sufficient cooldown reduction) she gets the bonus back for its remaining duration.

Cocoon.name: Cocoon
Cocoon.blurb: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
Cocoon.description: Active: Elise fires a web in the target direction, granting  sight of the first enemy hit for 1 second and  stunning them.

Rappel.name: Rappel
Rappel.blurb: Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
Rappel.description: Active: Elise lifts up into the air, becoming  untargetable for up to 2 seconds and  revealing the area for the duration. While she is in the air she can select a target to instantly descend upon.
Rappel.description2: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise automatically descends upon them after 1 second. Upon landing, Elise's  Spider Queen bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.
Rappel.notes:
* When Elise casts Rappel a circle shows the area in which a target or location can be selected.
Elise only gains an increase in her passive bonuses if she directly targets an enemy with Rappel.
 Elise cannot descend outside the bounds of this circle.

 Elise can cast Rappel on any targetable enemy unit (minions, monsters, champions, pets, wards, and traps (provided she has  true sight)).
If Elise’s target is closer than Rappel’s max range, Elise will attempt to position herself behind that target.
Elise’s descending location is determined upon target-cast. Elise’s descending location does not change after being determined, even if her target moves.

Spider Form.name: Spider Form / Human Form
Spider Form.blurb: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
Spider Form.description: Passive:  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased.
Spider Form.description2: Human Form - Active: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed,  melee basic attacks with 125  range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, Elise unleashes all stored Spiderlings.
Spider Form.description3: Spider Form - Active: Elise transforms into her human form, gaining  ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, Elise stores all unleashed Spiderlings.
Spider Form.description4: Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
Spider Form.notes:
* Both Spider Form and Human Form have no cast time and do not interrupt Elise's previous orders.
 Spider Form and Human Form have separate cooldowns.

 Neither transformation counts as an activation for the purposes of items such as  Tear of the Goddess, Spellblade, and  Force Pulse.
